'ItemTypes' 0xf50 //Xbow;@pushlist 'ItemTypes' 0x13b2 //Bow;//Wands;@pushlist 'ItemTypes' 0xdf5;@pushlist 'ItemTypes' 0xdf4;@pushlist 'ItemTypes' 0xdf3;@pushlist 'ItemTypes' 0xdf2;//Treasure Maps;@pushlist 'ItemTypes' 0x14ec;if @listexists 'ItemProperties';@clearlist 'ItemProperties';else;@createlist 'ItemProperties';endif;@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'Fortification';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'Invulnerability';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'Power';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'Vanquishing';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'Slayer';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'silver';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'Heal';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'Lightning';@pushlist 'ItemProperties' 'map';@unsetalias 'keep';promptalias 'keep';@unsetalias 'sell';promptalias 'sell';@unsetalias 'unsorted';promptalias 'unsorted';useskill 'Item Identification';waitfortarget 1000;target! 'unsorted';pause 500;for 0 to 'ItemTypes';while @findtype ItemTypes[] 'any' 'unsorted';@clearjournal;pause 200;clickobject! 'found';pause 500;for 0 to 'ItemProperties';if @injournal ItemProperties[];headmsg ItemProperties[];moveitem! 'found' 'keep';pause 1000;break;endif;pause 100;endfor;if @findobject 'found' 'any' 'unsorted';moveitem! 'found' 'sell';pause 1000;endif;endwhile;endfor;

headmsg 'Select your sparring partner';promptalias 'partner';if timerexists 'heal_timer';removetimer 'heal_timer';endif;createtimer 'heal_timer';if listexists 'heal_duration';removelist 'heal_duration';endif;createlist 'heal_duration';pushlist 'heal_duration' 0;while not dead 'self';if not @findlayer 'self' 1;findtype 0xf52 // PLACE YOUR PREFERRED WEAPON GRAPHIC ID HERE;equipitem 'found' 1;endif;for 0 to 'heal_duration';// There is only one element in heal_duration, this is just a way to create a "variable".;if timer 'heal_timer' > heal_duration[0];poplist 'heal_duration' 'front';pushlist 'heal_duration' 0;settimer 'heal_timer' 0;endif;if heal_duration[] == 0;// If heal_duration is 0, we're not actively healing anything.;if diffhits > 70;bandageself;poplist 'heal_duration' 'front';pushlist 'heal_duration' 10100;settimer 'heal_timer' 0;else;if timer 'heal_timer' > 30000 // 1000 = 1 second, change to desired time;bandage 'partner';poplist 'heal_duration' 'front';pushlist 'heal_duration' 5100;settimer 'heal_timer' 0;endif;endif;endif;endfor;if skill 'anatomy' < 100;useskill 'Anatomy';waitfortarget 1000;target 'partner';endif;endwhile;stop;
